item.title: 10 Biggest Fantasy Books Coming Out In November 2024
item.description: There’s no shortage of new fantasy books coming out in November 2024, from cozy stories with talking cats to high-stakes murder mysteries.

item.title: This 1957 Legal Drama Is The Perfect Watch While Waiting For Clint Eastwood’s Juror #2 To Hit VOD
item.description: Most fans must wait for Clint Eastwood's Juror #2 to hit VOD to watch the movie, but one legal drama from 1957 is the perfect watch while waiting.

item.title: Clint Eastwood's Juror No. 2 Expected To Hit Streaming Soon After Shortened Theatrical Run
item.description: Juror No. 2 is expected to soon be available to stream on Max despite the Clint Eastwood-directed movie only just debuting in theaters.
